ygData.subject: Re: To RP together...or NOT to RP together
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/17/99 8:07:24 AM Mountain Daylight Time, janeways@startrekmail.com writes:
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/17/99 8:07:24 AM Mountain Daylight Time,
janeways@... writes:

<< As for significant others I was quite amazed to read that some that are
married don't "play" that in EQ >>

I really dont find it that amazing, but then I am one of the ones that dont
RP that relationship with my RL husband in game. In game we RP brother and
sister. The main reason that came about was (no lectures please ::chuckles)
we fought so much initially about the game. He would die...and get upset
with me. I would level past him...he would get upset with me. Basically
what Im saying is that, though we love each other deeply, we are also
entirely too competitive with each other. Another reason was, we have
complete opposite styles of RP (personality wise) and if i spend too long
with him in game i want to do something (like give him the biggest wedgie of
his life) to make him lighten up. He can be a bit stuffy. Needless to say,
it makes me want to pull my hair out. So we determined a very long time ago
that our characters were not meant to be together in "that" way.

It actually works very well for us. And, from the brother and sister
standpoint, we actually work very well. We can also climb in bed at night
without the danger of a "game" sending us off to sleep angry with each other.
And we DO get together from time to time to help each other out.

In Light,

The player behind Mystyrain
